# Sabotash: Sabotaging ASH
[![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/)
[![AppVeyor Build Status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/github/dcgerard/sabotash?branch=master&svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/dcgerard/sabotash)

This package, when loaded, will change the namespace of `ashr` so that
the functions `ashr::ash` and `ashr::ash.workhorse` will return
random, though convincing, numbers.
